alert.note: Alert for Geneva (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 3:49PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Geneva, northwestern Jackson, eastern Holmes and northeastern Washington Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 349 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Geneva to near Chipley. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chipley, Graceville, Geneva, Bonifay, Hartford, Slocomb, Cottondale, Esto, Campbellton, Coffee Springs, Noma, Black, Richter Crossroads, Chancellor, Kellys Crossroads, Lytle, Tendil Crossing, Marl, Geneva Municipal A/P and Holland Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
